name: Sabotage (aaltenbu)
description:
Sabotage is a game of strategy, where players must decide whether to work together or take each other out as they strive to have the most remaining points. Whatever path you choose, know that no two games will be alike. Players are forced to strategize with a random hand of cards each game and figure out each other's game plan. However, the mechanics of Sabotage are simple enough for any player, newcomer or experienced, to enjoy playing with everyone else.

Follow the link to play on PlayingCards.io!

https://playingcards.io/ngj8ya
